Module requestV3
Package test

Class Supervisor

java.lang.Object
test.User
test.Supervisor
Direct Known Subclasses:
FYPCoordinator
public class Supervisor extends User
The Supervisor class represents a supervisor user in the FYP management system. This class inherits from the User class and adds properties specific to supervisors, such as the number of projects they are supervising, the number of projects they have created, and lists of incoming and outgoing requests.
Version:
9 Apr 2023
Author:
A34_3
